Title: Marynn Dause: Literature Performance Odyssey with Performances and Student Leadership (e318)
Description:
They only had a few days to teach the entire Odyssey. So, teacher Marynn Dause met with her students. They decided to follow the pattern of Homer and become storytelling bards themselves with powerful results. Marynn shares this innovative approach to teaching the Odyssey invented by her students along with their advice for using this method in your classroom.

Show Notes: www.coolcatteacher.com/e318
